scripts.dev: npm run dev:clean-port && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=8192 ts-node-dev --respawn --transpile-only src/server.ts
scripts.dev:clean-port: node -e "const { execSync } = require('child_process'); try { if (process.platform === 'win32') { const result = execSync('netstat -ano | findstr :3000', { encoding: 'utf8' }); const lines = result.split('\n').filter(l => l.trim()); lines.forEach(line => { const match = line.match(/\s+(\d+)\s*$/); if (match) { try { execSync(`taskkill /PID ${match[1]} /F`, { stdio: 'ignore' }); } catch (e) {} } }); } else { execSync('lsof -ti:3000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null', { stdio: 'ignore' }); } } catch (e) {}"
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run prisma:generate && npm run prisma:migrate
